MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the LL11postcode area of Wrexham. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 3:40AM. Our engineers are on their way to Heol Celyn to investigate the cause of the fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7AM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:09AM on 19 December 2020.
